XXjsphustu:521: hastasyāṅguṣṭhāgre āvartā sūkṣmarekhā tāṃ draṣṭuṃ śīlaṃ yasya sa [ta]thoktaḥ, tasya na nivāryate |
XXjsphustu:524: tena hastapaścimakāvartadarśinā kiyantaṃ kālaṃ pratyavekṣaṇīyamiti āha |
XXjsphustu:526: locanasyākṣṇorvibhramo mā bhūditi kṛtvā ciraṃ bahukālaṃ na [pa]śyet na nirīkṣayet |
XXjsphustu:532: śāṭhayañcittakauṭilyaṃ yena tathābhūtaṃ nāviṣkaroti asphuṭaṃ pratipadya |
XXjsphustu:538: yāvat kālāntareṇa ṣaṣṭyabdaḥ ṣaṣṭivarṣaḥ kuñjaro hastī paribhramyate |
XXjsphustu:539: śakaṭaṃ vā vaṃśapūrṇaṃ yāvatā kālena kālāntareṇa bhramati, sa īdṛgvidhakāla ityarthaḥ
XXjsphustu:542: ūrdhvā ca adharā ca madhyamā ca ūrdhvādhomadhyamāḥ |
XXjsphustu:547: āsāṃ tisṛṇāmapi bhūmīnāṃ madhye yā yā bhūḥ śuddhimāyāti niḥ prāṇakā bhavati,
XXjsphustu:551: yasyāṃ nadyāṃ puṣkariṇyāṃ vā, sthūlā mahāntaḥ prāṇakā
XXjsphustu:552: karatalahatāḥ hastena hatāḥ santaḥ adhaḥ sthalaṃ yānti tatra jalaṃ
XXjsphustu:555: yadi karatalāhatāḥ santaḥ prāṇino 'dho [na] yānti tadā srāvayitavyaṃ tadudakaṃ
XXjsphustu:559: yasminnudake prāṇinaḥ kare lagnā uttiṣṭhanti na tatra pāṇipādāsyavastrādikaṃ kṣālayedyatiriti
XXjsphustu:562: kule ityādi || kule yaḥ śrāmaṇeraḥ bhojanāya nimantritaḥ, tena tatra gatvā
XXjsphustu:563: praṣṭavyaṃ- kimatra jalaṃ srāvitaṃ na veti |
XXjsphustu:566: yadi pṛṣṭaḥ san dānapatiḥ bravīti na srāvitamiti, tadā saṃjñiko vācyaḥ |
XXjsphustu:567: saṃjñāsyāstīti saṃjñikaḥ, sa viśiṣṭa eva gṛhyate |
XXjsphustu:572: yaḥ stha[vi]rataraḥ parisrāvayituṃ na jānāti, sa srāvayeti na vaktavyaḥ |
XXjsphustu:574: yadi tathaiko 'pi srāvaṇāya kuśalo na bhavati, tadā kiṃ kartavyaṃ ityāha |
XXjsphustu:577: sajantukajalamātmīyapātre muktvā kutaḥ punaretadudakamānītamiti pṛṣṭaṃ yataḥ puṣkariṇyāderānītaṃ tatraiva muñcetsvayamiti |
XXjsphustu:578: mā bhūdanyatra kṣāraṃ nīramupaghātakṛtaṃ prāṇināmiti tatraivetyāha |
XXjsphustu:580: athavā yatra sapta divasān pānīyamavatiṣṭhati tatra tat saprāṇakamudakaṃ moktavyaṃ |
XXjsphustu:586: kecittadaśuṣyati tatra pānīyāśoṣaṇaṃ nimittamiti nimittasaptamīṃ varṇayanti |
XXjsphustu:590: svacchamanāvilaṃ, nīraughaṃ jalaughaṃ voḍhuṃ śīlaṃ yasyeti bhāvaḥ |
XXjsphustu:592: tasminnīdṛgvidhe vṛṣṭe sati tāni [sa]prāṇakāni jalāni nimnagānāṃ patiṃ mahāsamudrapātaṅgacchateti uktvā visarjayet |
XXjsphustu:595: | tadā tat saprāṇakaṃ jalaṃ kiṃ kartavyamityāha |
XXjsphustu:598: vaktraṃ mukhaṃ dīrghaṃ yasyā rajjudvayena ca (SŚ 22) baddhā ghaṭikā sā evamucyate |
XXjsphustu:599: tayā dūragatādhvagena udake kūpe adhastāttadudakaṃ muñcet ||
XXjsphustu:602: tisro ghaṭikāḥ pratyavekṣya mārgageṇa udapānataḥ kūpāt jalaṃ pātavyaṃ |
XXjsphustu:610: kathamanyathā? yadi tāstisro ghaṭikā na śudhyanti, tadā sajantukaṃ jalaṃ
XXjsphustu:618: yatopyūrdhvādhomadhyamāstisraḥ salilasyāpi bhūmayaḥ iti kārikāyāṃ stokaṃ pratyavekṣitavyamiti yuktaṃ na ca tatra sarvaṃ śikṣāpadañcedaṃ, nādeyādi jalaṃ jānanniti vacanāt |
XXjsphustu:625: śakye 'pi kasmānnaivaṃ sarvaṃ śikṣāpadaṃ cedaṃ, nādeyādijalaṃ jānanniti vacanāt |
XXjsphustu:633: rajjuśca ghaṭikā ca rajjughaṭike tayo rdānaṃ parityāgaḥ |
XXjsphustu:637: saha prāṇakena vartata iti saprāṇakaṃ jalaṃ, tasmin |
XXjsphustu:641: tatsaprāṇakamudakaṃ parasmai pibeti vaktuṃ dātuṃ vā na jātu kadācit yatiḥ kṣamate |
XXjsphustu:643: kiṃ tena saprāṇakamidaṃ taḍāgādi ityapi na vaktavyamityāha |
XXjsphustu:645: iyaṃ puṣkariṇī sarittaḍāgādi saprāṇakamiti pareṣāmuccaiḥ śabdairna vadet |
XXjsphustu:646: atha yadi kaścit pṛcchati, kimidaṃ, prativacanaṃ dadyāt, saprāṇakamiti, taḍāgādi |
XXjsphustu:647: tadā kuru kāryaṃ na veti samīkṣyeti |
XXjsphustu:648: pṛṣṭaḥ prativadet parān pratyavekṣya jala kṛtyaṃ kuru |
XXjsphustu:649: ityevaṃ sati pṛṣṭaḥ san paraṃ yatirvadet |
XXjsphustu:655: saprāṇakamidaṃ taḍāgādi na veti sphuṭaṃ vaktavyaṃ |
XXjsphustu:657: evaṃ tarhyātmanaḥ saprāṇakajalapānapratiṣedhāt pareṣāñca dānapratiṣedhāt vṛkṣādīnāmacetanānāṃ saprāṇakenodakena sekānnadānaṃ na nirudhyate |
XXjsphustu:661: (SŚ 24) upādhyāyācāryāṇāmapi snānaṃ na kāryamiti anena bāhyabhogo nivāritaḥ ||
XXjsphustu:662: kiṃ punarjalameva saprāṇakamokṛtaṃ dātraṃ vakraṃ na kuryāt,
XXjsphustu:670: tadevamādikaṃ saprāṇakaṃ yatirna pibet, na parasmai dadyāt, bhuvi pṛthivyāṃ na tyajet |
XXjsphustu:672: saha matkuṇairvattate yacchayanaṃ tadātape na śoṣa yat
XXjsphustu:673: | hime kardame śotavāriṇi uṣṇavāriṇi vā [na] kṣipet |
XXjsphustu:676: caityārāmavihārādīnāṃ navakarma sajantukenodakena na yatiḥ kuryāt |
XXjsphustu:678: srāvayitvā tadudakaṃ dināntaṃ na sakalaṃ divasaṃ trikoṇakaṃ khallakaṃ dhāryaṃ dhārayitavyamityarthaḥ
XXjsphustu:679: kintu kālena kālaṃ parisrāvaṇaṃ moktavyaṃ prāṇakānāṃ pīḍāparihārārthaṃ duṣkṛtaparihārārthañceti
XXjsphustu:685: bhṛtaka, khallakaṃ bandha, kūpādevamudakamutkṣipya evaṃ srāvaya, evaṃ vimocaya khallakamiti
XXjsphustu:686: yadi srāvyamāṇamapi tadudakaṃ saprāṇakaṃ bhavati, tadā kiṃ kartavyamityāha
XXjsphustu:688: yadyekapuṭakhallakena srāvyamāṇaṃ tadudakaṃ na śudhyati, tadā yāvatsaptapuṭake[na] khallakena srāvyaṃ tadambhaḥ pānīyaṃ |
XXjsphustu:689: athaivamapi na śudhyati, tadā pratikūpikā kāryā |
XXjsphustu:690: yadi sā na śudhyeta, tadā navakarma tyaktvā deśāntaraṃ gantavya |
XXjsphustu:694: ete hi kuṇarūpiṇaḥ prāṇakāḥ abhūtvā saṃbhavanti, bhūtvā ca paścādvinaśyanti |
XXjsphustu:695: yadā tāvadamī prāṇakā bhūtvā bhavāntaraṃ janmāntaraṃ
XXjsphustu:705: ucchīdanti uchrayeṇa catvāryaṅgulāni yasya mañcādeḥ tasmāt nadyādau salilaṃ grahītavyaṃ |
XXjsphustu:708: etaduktaṃ bhavati- nadītaḍāgādiṣu mañcapīṭhasaṃsthānaṃ dhāraṇapātraṃ ghanena paṭenāveṣṭaya madhye tu upalādikaṃ datvā udake nimajya caturāṅgulamucchritaṃ kṛtvā tadantargatamudakaṃ pratyavekṣya jalakāryaṃ kāryamiti ||
XXjsphustu:710: chidrite kāṣṭhamaye karṇadvaye āsaktaṃ baddhaṃ yatsūtraṃ, tacchidrakarṇadvayāsaktasūtraṃ
XXjsphustu:711: tena baddhaṃ dvidaṇḍake daṇḍakadvaye yaddhāraṇapātrakaṃ tattathoktaṃ |
XXjsphustu:712: (SŚ 26) tadīdṛgvidhaṃ dhāraṇapātrakaṃ trikoṇakasya khallakasya bahirheṣṭhaṃ dadhyāt ||
XXjsphustu:714: kṛpayā karuṇayā parītaḥ samantāt idaṃ gṛhīta cittaṃ yasya yateḥ sa tathoktaḥ |
XXjsphustu:715: tena kṛpāvatā śrīghanena svādu mṛṣṭaṃ vāri pānīyaṃ sajantukaṃ saprāṇakaṃ kṣārembhasi kṣārīye jale na moktavyaṃ notsraṣṭavyaṃ |
XXjsphustu:716: yastu niṣkṛpo muñcati tasya duṣkṛtaṃ bhavati |
XXjsphustu:718: yastu kṣārīye jale mṛṣṭasaṃjñī mṛṣṭābhiprāyastasya anāpat |
XXjsphustu:721: tatra sakalena śarīreṇetyārabhya yāvadavakrītādirityetaiḥ kārikāntarairduṣkṛta pūrvakaḥ saṃvaratyāga uktaḥ |
XXjsphustu:726: sphuṭārthāyāṃ śroghanācārasaṃgrahaṭīkāyāṃ prāṇivadhaviratiśikṣāpadaṃ nāma prathamaṃ samāptaṃ
XXjsphustu:736: sakṛtparigṛhītaṃ saptāhaṃ kṣamate śrī[gha]nasya bhikṣoriti sāptāhikaṃ ghṛtādi |
XXjsphustu:740: anyadgurudravyaṃ na bhavati sāṃghikasyaiva gurudravyatvena vivakṣitatvāt |
XXjsphustu:741: spraṣṭuṃ kṣamate parihartuñca, na tu punaḥ pinvitumiti |
XXjsphustu:744: tadevaṃ kālikaṃ yāvadakalpikaṃ dravyaṃ nādadīta parasvakamiti vakṣyate ||
XXjsphustu:760: ebhiraṣṭābhiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiśca dravyaiḥ sarvadravyasaṃgrahaḥ kṛto bhavati |
XXjsphustu:761: yadevaṃ ṣoḍaśabhireva dravyaiḥ sarvadravyasaṃgrahe siddhe kimarthamaṣṭau pariṣkārāḥ pṛthagucyante kālikādīni? satyametat |
XXjsphustu:762: kintu tebhya eva ṣoḍaśebhyo dravyebhyo niṣkṛṣya kālikāditvamasāṃkaryeṇa pratipādanārthamaṣṭau pariṣkārāḥ pṛthaṅnirdiśyante |
XXjsphustu:775: | tasya yaścaturtho bhāgaḥ kākinīnyūnāḥ pañca māṣakāḥ, tān haran |
XXjsphustu:776: athavā tadarghaṃ tanmūlyaṃ dhanaṃ śāṭakādi[s]teyacittaḥ cauryābhiprāyaḥ śrāmaṇeraḥ haran sthānāt cyāvayan svīkurvan anyairyatibhirlaghu (SŚ 29)
XXjsphustu:781: caturvāṭāntarāvasthite hastini hriyamāṇe yadi tatra vṛhaddvārā vāṭā
XXjsphustu:782: bhavanti, tadā caturbhiḥ pādaiścyute gaje ayatiḥ bhavati |
XXjsphustu:783: atha saṃvṛtā dvārā, tadā niṣkrānte sati dvipahṛtsyāt |
XXjsphustu:786: evamanayā kārikayā sthānadvayaṃ pratipādita vistīrṇadvāre pādau sthānamityekaṃ, saṃvṛtadvāre vāṭeti dvitīyaṃ ||
XXjsphustu:795: yathā vṛhaddvāravāṭāyāṃ gajasya pādacyutimātreṇa saṃvaratyāga uktaḥ svalpadvārāyāñca niṣkrānte sati, evaṃ pañjare 'pi
XXjsphustu:796: vṛhaddvāre pādacyutimātreṇa svalpadvāre niṣkrānte pakṣiṇi sati yatiḥ dvijahṛtsyāditi |
XXjsphustu:798: gulphopanibandhanaṃ sthānaṃ, vṛhaddvāre pañjare pādau sthānaṃ, svalpadvāre
XXjsphustu:802: tatra yadyekasmādaṅgādanyasminnaṅge śirasi vā tatsaṃdeśadraviṇaṃ (SŚ 30) dravyaṃ sañcārayet stainyacittena saṃvaradhūtaṃ
XXjsphustu:806: yasmin pudgalāyaṇādhitame dravyamamukena pudgalenāsau mṛta ityevaṃ manyatānyasmādadhvagāt brahmacāriṇaḥ sakāśācchratvā sīmānte sthātuṃ śīlaṃ yasya tasmai bhāgamadatvā gṛhṇan yatirayatirbhavet, aśrāmaṇero bhavatīti yāvat |
XXjsphustu:808: atha mṛtasya śrāmaṇerasya taddravyaṃ tatkasya prāpnotītyāha |
XXjsphustu:809: yadvittamityādi || mṛtasya yaterathavārhataḥ parinirvṛtasya yaddravyaṃ tatsarvamupādhyāyasya prāpnotītyevaṃ jagaumuniḥ, bhagavānāhetyarthaḥ |
XXjsphustu:813: tatra harturiṣṭāmabhipretāṃ diśaṃ yadi hastī yāyāt,
XXjsphustu:819: hṛto hastī mameti saṃjñā yasya tasmin hṛtasaṃjñini karipe sati asau hartā vratī cauraḥ syādaśrāmaṇero
XXjsphustu:822: upacāraḥ, paripanthi cittaṃ ceti catvāri sthānāni nirdiṣṭāni ||
XXjsphustu:828: avanau pṛthivyāṃ yā cyutiḥ pātaḥ asyāḥ cyutau satyāṃ bhraśyate |
XXjsphustu:836: yadā anyonyāparijñānādubhau corayataścīvaramālāyā antadvayaṃ muñcatastadā parasparaparigrahaḥ sthānaṃ |
XXjsphustu:838: kṣiptetyādi || kṣiptāni prakīrṇāni mauktikahārādīni yasmin mahākule tadevamucyate |
XXjsphustu:839: tatra gato yatiḥ sahāye jāte sati tasyaiva sahāyasya hastāyāṃ prasevikāyāṃ tataḥ kulāt prakīrṇamauktikahārādi gṛhītvā nyasati |
XXjsphustu:840: tannyastaṃ tenaiva sahāyena hārayan kiṃ saṃvaracyutiriti vakṣyate |
XXjsphustu:842: athavā jaṭālena lomaśena śunā kurkureṇa tanmahākulāt taṃ mauktikahārādikaṃ hārayan upalāpya vatsaṃ tṛṇādinā gokāyapotakaṃ haran kiṃ
XXjsphustu:843: saṃvaracyutiḥ? kiṃ punaḥ (SŚ 32) pādacyutimātreṇaiva saṃvaratyāgo bhavati?
XXjsphustu:846: yadi taiḥ sahāyakurkuravatsairupacārastyakto bhavet, tadā yateḥ saṃvaratyāgo bhavati
XXjsphustu:850: etān ete gāvo hariṣyantīti atra pūrvavadādiśet, yaduta cyutasaṃvaro bhavatīti |
XXjsphustu:851: tadevamādibhistisṛbhiḥ kārikābhirupacāraścittaṃ ca śakaṭādiṣu tatsaṃjñitvaṃ mamatvalābhaśca sthānamuktaṃ ||
XXjsphustu:855: bhavati, kaṭhinañca bandhanaṃ bhavati, tadā utkṣipyamāṇameva [ba]ndhanaṃ
XXjsphustu:858: atha kuṭilaḥ kīlako bhavatīti bandhanañca śithilaṃ
XXjsphustu:860: vakratvena kīlakasya śithilatvena bandhasya kīlakasthānānatikramaṃ darśayati |
XXjsphustu:862: yadā tu sarveṇa sarvaṃ bandhanamuktaṃ bhavati,
XXjsphustu:865: ghaṭasya chidraṃ kṛtvā sarpirghṛtaṃ, kṣaudraṃ madhu,
XXjsphustu:866: tailaṃ tilatailādi, jalaṃ nādeyādi haran yatiryadi pūrārpyataṅgataṃ bhavet, dhārā ca vicchinnā bhavettadā saṃvarakṣobhamāpnute,
XXjsphustu:868: avicchinnāyāṃ tu dhārāyāṃ yadi śrāmaṇyāpekṣayā nivartate, tadā na bhavatīti vinayavido varṇayanti |
XXjsphustu:871: lipsālābhābhilāṣaḥ, tayā lipsayā ekasya bhrāturbhāgāt yadi bālamātramapi
XXjsphustu:874: atha kiṃ cauragṛhītaṃ pātrādi tyaktāśayasya śanaiḥ punargṛhītuṃ labhyate?
XXjsphustu:876: taskareṇa caureṇa upāttaṃ gṛhītaṃ yatpātrādi taṃ nirāśaḥ san yatiḥ punarbhūyaḥ ādadat gṛhṇan saṃvarād bhraśyata iti |
XXjsphustu:880: itarastu anyaktāśaḥ punargṛhṇan nāpadaṃ prāpnoti, ayatirnabhavatītyarthaḥ |
XXjsphustu:881: kiṃ punastattaskaropāttaṃ pātrādi gopālādidattaṃ gṛhītuṃ labhyate? temityāha |
XXjsphustu:883: yadi taccauragṛhītaṃ pātraṃ mitrabhāvena labdhaṃ bhavet mahatā vā kārpaṇyena gopālādibhirvā dattaṃ syāt, tadā ādadānasya yaternāpattiriṣyate, duṣkṛtamapi na bhavatītyarthaḥ ||
XXjsphustu:884: yadi caurāḥ pātracīvaraṃ gṛhītvā na dadate, tadā kathaṃ pratipattavyamityāha |
XXjsphustu:886: pātrasya cīvarasya ca muktaye teṣāṃ caurāṇāṃ bhayopadarśanaṃ kārya |
XXjsphustu:887: yatra tu rājani teṣāṃ malimlucāṃ bandhanādikaṃ bhavati, tatra gatvā na vaktavya mebhiścauraiḥ vayaṃ muṣitā iti ||
XXjsphustu:890: upādhyāyācāryāṇāṃ yatpātracīvaraṃ tvaṃ niṣkāsayasi tadāvayostava ca mama ca |
XXjsphustu:891: tadityevamuktvā yadyeko 'pi yatistatpātracīvaramapaharet, tadā dvāvapi tau vratinau taskarau bhavataḥ |
XXjsphustu:894: tatra ubhayabhāgādekasya yateḥ bhāgārdhena ekopya'yatirbhavati, dvitīyopītarapudgalaniṣkāsitārdheneti
XXjsphustu:895: atha yadā bahavaḥ śrāmaṇerāḥ saṃbhūya kākinīnyūnān pañca māṣakānapahareyustadā kiṃ te saṃvariṇo bhavantyuta neti? asaṃvariṇa eva bhavantyekābhiprāyatvāt (SŚ 34) sarve dvāri sthitacellakavat dāsyāma ityādi |
XXjsphustu:896: ete yataya ekābhiprāyā mahallakena saha kriyākāraṃ kurvata |
XXjsphustu:897: mahallaka, samaṃ tava bhāgaṃ dāsyāmaḥ, kevalaṃ dvāre tiṣṭha vaya caurikāṃ kariṣyāma iti
XXjsphustu:905: kaścidāgantuko yatiḥ uṣitvā, nivāsaṃ kalpayitvā pātracīvaraṃ
XXjsphustu:907: tasminnāgantuke gate āgatyāgatya yo yatiḥ tatpātracīvara gāpayetsa caurā bhavati |
XXjsphustu:909: amunānantaroktena prayogeṇa yadi sarve āvāsikāstadāgantukasya pātramapa[ha]reyustadā sava kṣatasaṃvarā bhavanti |
XXjsphustu:910: yasya tu tatpātracīvaraṃ, sa yadi saṃsmṛtya nayati na kilviṣī |
XXjsphustu:915: yaḥ śrāmaṇeraḥ steyacittenānyasya yateḥ pātramanyena yatinā
XXjsphustu:917: yastvānetā tasyaivaṃvidhā buddhiretatpātraṃ asyaivānāyayituryaterityevaṃ sati na
XXjsphustu:919: ye tu sahānīya yatirvratīti paṭhanti, teṣāṃ vinā sahaśabdena (SŚ 35) tṛtīyaryava sahārthasya dyātitatvāt sahaśabdagrahaṇamatiricyate |
XXjsphustu:920: na vā sahārtha iyaṃ tṛtīyā kartari vighānāt |
XXjsphustu:924: yāvat munerbuddhasya bhagavataḥ pūjā kriyate tāvat saṃghasyāpi pūjāsatkāraḥ pravartate ityevaṃ matvā yaḥ sāṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ stainyacittena stūpāya dadāti, staupikaṃ vā lābhaṃ saṃghāya dadāti sa
XXjsphustu:926: nanu ca yāḥ kāścitsaṃpadaḥ sarvāstā bhagavantamāgamyati |
XXjsphustu:929: etadeva hi vidāraṇaṃ stainyacittasyotthāpakaṃ yathā kāruṇyena salilamapaharata iti |
XXjsphustu:931: kiṃ punaḥ sāṃghikātkośāt stūpasyoddhārakaṃ gṛhītuṃ labhyate? nemityāha |
XXjsphustu:933: savārikairvā pakṣavārike māsavārāvārikairvā sāṃghikātkośāt likhitvoddhārakaṃ grahītavyaṃ |
XXjsphustu:937: taiśca vārikaiḥ karmādānaparisamāptau vaktavyaṃ- iyat hiraṇyaṃ suvarṇādi staupikāt kāśādagṛhītaṃ sāṃghikācca iyaditi |
XXjsphustu:940: yadi vinā likhitvoddhārakaṃ gṛhṇanti, māsaniṣkāse ca na vadanti, tadā noktakṛto bhavanti |
XXjsphustu:941: uktaṃ na kurvantīti noktakṛto, duṣkṛte prāpnuvantītyarthaḥ ||
XXjsphustu:946: tena mukto yaḥ parakīryo 'śaḥ taṃ haratīti svāṃśamuktaharaḥ,
XXjsphustu:948: etau yatī ekatra kule lābhaṃ labhete |
XXjsphustu:949: tayordvayormadhye yaḥ parabhāgaharaḥ śrāmaṇeraḥ sa cauro bhavati
XXjsphustu:950: | viśvāsaṃ tu punardāsyāmīti ca kṛtvā gṛhṇan nāpadaṃ prāpnoti |
XXjsphustu:953: yaṃ tvaṃ lābhaṃ labhase ahañca yaṃ lābha labhe tadāvayostava ca mama ca vaditvaivaṃ kriyākāraṃ kṛtvā samutpanne lābhe sati yastaṃ kriyākāraṃ bhinati tatordhena taskaro
XXjsphustu:956: yathā dvayoḥ kulopakayorekasya kriyākāraṃ bhindataḥ saṃvaracyutiruktā, eva dakṣiṇādeśane 'pi draṣṭavya |
XXjsphustu:958: dvayośca pāṃśukūlikayormadhye pāṃśukūle samutpanne sati yaḥ kriyākāraṃ bhinatti sa cyutasaṃvaro bhavati ||
XXjsphustu:959: prāṅnirdiṣṭaḥ sāṃghiko lābhaḥ stūpāya na dātavyaḥ staupikaśca saṃghāyeti |
XXjsphustu:960: anyasmai sutarāṃ dātuṃ na labhyata ityabhiniveśatyājanārthaṃ vidhiṃ darśayannāha |
XXjsphustu:966: vihārasvāmi rājādayaḥ upakāriṇaḥ, caurādayo 'nupakāriṇa iti yathākramaṃ ubhau boddhavyo ||
XXjsphustu:968: yadi cellakāḥ sāṃghike vihāre ālepanaṃ saṃmārja[nā]dikaṃ kurvanti tadā tebhyaḥ saṃghataḥ pādāsyaṅsa pūrvāhṇikādi
XXjsphustu:970: apiśabdena na kevalamupakāryapakāriṇo jñātavyāḥ śrīghanebhyo 'pyevaṃvidhakarmakāribhya iti (SŚ 37) darśayati |
XXjsphustu:971: nanu ca śrāmaṇerasya pravraji[ta]tvādvināpi vihāralepanādikaraṇena sāṃghikānnapānaparibhogo labhyata eva |
XXjsphustu:973: idameva āśaṃvayamāne kṛte tricīvareṇa vibhūṣitasya hi bhikṣoḥ sāṃghikānnapānaparibhogo 'nujñāto bhagavatā sūtre, na śrāmaṇarasya ato
XXjsphustu:978: sīmāntarāle syātuṃ śolaṃ yasya yatestasmai bhikṣusahitāya bhikṣūṇāyupasyātakāriṇe taṇḍulādikaṃ datvā dārakaprasyavyājena taṇḍulādikaṃ yatirgṛhṇīyāt |
XXjsphustu:980: sīmāntasthāyine adatveti vātrākāraḥ praśliṣṭāstāti matvaivaṃ vyāvakṣate |
XXjsphustu:981: sīmāntapātine yataye taṇḍulādikamadatvā dārakaprasthavyapadeśena taṇḍulādi na grāhyamiti tadatrobhayasmin pāṭhe na doṣaḥ ||
XXjsphustu:983: atyaktā pātrādi pratyāśā yena sa tathoktaḥ |
XXjsphustu:988: kathamevaṃ matvā? atyaktāśasya matvā naṣṭaṃ pātracīvaraṃ gṛhītuṃ labhyate,
XXjsphustu:990: evaṃ gṛddho yatiḥ kīdṛśa ityāha naṣṭapātrādiḥ |
XXjsphustu:993: (SŚ 38) yatraiva naṣṭapātrādi lapsye, tatraiva grahīṣyāmītyevaṃ prajño bhavedityarthaḥ |
XXjsphustu:994: yastu nirāśībhūtaḥ pātra cīvaraṃ naṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāti, tasya duṣkṛtaṃ bhavati,
XXjsphustu:996: na hi tena caurāt praticaurikā kṛtānapahṛtatvāddravyasya
XXjsphustu:999: ete śrāmaṇerā saṃghaśīlakaṃ kṛtvā kriyākāraṃ kurvanti |
XXjsphustu:1000: svādhyāyamadhyayanamuddeśaṃ vā kariṣyāma ityevaṃ kriyākāraṃ kṛtvā ye kriyākāraṃ na pratipālayanti, te jinoditalaṃghinaḥ |
XXjsphustu:1001: jinena buddhena bhagavatā ya uditaḥ ukto vinayastaṃ laṃghituṃ śīlaṃ yeṣāṃ te jinoditalaṃghino, duṣkṛtaṃ prāpnuvantītyarthaḥ |
XXjsphustu:1002: tadanena sarvatraivaṃ dhārmika kriyākārātikrame duṣkṛtaṃ bhavatītyākhyātaṃ bhavati ||
XXjsphustu:1006: tena paṇḍarabhikṣustūpāderapi gṛhṇataḥ syādeva duṣkṛtaṃ, na tu saṃvaratyāgaḥ svāmino 'bhāvāt
XXjsphustu:1007: yatra tu stūpe devalakaḥ āste tasmādgṛhṇataḥ syādeva saṃvaratyāgaḥ |
XXjsphustu:1008: anilena vātena tu uddhṛtaṃ kaṃpitaṃ pātitaṃ ca yatpatākādi tatpāṃśukalamiti kṛtvā gahītavyaṃ
XXjsphustu:1013: kintu tasmāt sthānāducitadānāpradānārtha yatparadravyanayanaṃ tadarthaṃ pareṣāṃ dravyaṃ yatiḥ svayaṃ na nayet, nāpi pareṇa nāyayet |
XXjsphustu:1014: śulkaṃ yatpradānaṃ tasya ca mokṣārthamupāyaṃ nopadiśet- amunā mārgeṇa gaccha, tataste śulkapradānaṃ na bhavati |
XXjsphustu:1017: vaṇi[ja]kaḥ śulkapradānamuktaye śulkātprāgyatibhyo yathāvṛddhikayā ratnaṃ datvā paścāt (SŚ 39) śulkakarayayativāhyakṛtākaṇḍikayā tadratnaṃ mārgayatoti ca |
XXjsphustu:1020: tasmin aparijñāte tairyatibhiḥ- evaṃ nāma tvaṃ mohapuruṣa, asmākaṃ visaṃvādayasītyevaṃ suṣṭhuparibhāṣya tadratnaṃ tasyaiva vaṇijā dātavyaṃ |
XXjsphustu:1025: tasmin pāribhogike dravye muneriva vratināṃ śulka nāsti |
XXjsphustu:1031: yatra grāme nagare vā yaḥ śrāmaṇero varṣāmupagataḥ,
XXjsphustu:1033: jīvitasya brahmacaryasya ca yayoḥ śrāmaṇerayornāśaḥ tayorapi varṣāvāsikalābhā dātavyaḥ |
XXjsphustu:1038: ye śrāmaṇerāḥ prāk śrāvaṇamāsasya pratipadi varṣāmupagatāstaiḥ prāgevāśvinamāsasya pratipadamārabhya varṣāvāsikayācanā kartavyā |
XXjsphustu:1039: ye tu paścāt bhādrapadamāsasya pratipadi varṣāmupagatāstaiḥ paścādeva kārtikamāse |
XXjsphustu:1040: yadi sarvaḥ saṃvaḥ prayamāyāmupagacchati tadā saṃghavaśena paścādupagatairapi yugapadeva varṣāvāsikalābho yācanīyaḥ ||
XXjsphustu:1044: karma kriyā karmeti kṛtvā, kriyate vā aneneti |
XXjsphustu:1046: tena hi karmaṇā sa pudgalo bhikṣuḥ kriyate |
XXjsphustu:1047: vastu karma ca vastukarmaṇo, (SŚ 40) tayorjugupsā nindā,
XXjsphustu:1048: tayā yaḥ pudgalo bhikṣubhāvaṃ parityajya punardīkṣāṃ pravrajyāṃ gṛhṇāti,
XXjsphustu:1049: tasmai api yataye varṣoṣitaiḥ saha samo lābho dātavyaḥ |
XXjsphustu:1052: buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pravrajitamanupravrajāmīti idaṃ karma viśiṣṭārthadyotakatvātkriyākarmeti kṛtvā |
XXjsphustu:1054: tayorjugupsā nindā, tayā yaḥ pudgalaḥ śrāmaṇerabhāvaṃ parityajya punardīkṣāṃ pravrajyāṃ gṛhṇāti, tasmai api yataye varṣoṣitaiḥ saha samo
XXjsphustu:1062: mithyādṛṣṭiśca nāstikapravṛttiḥ- nāsti mātā, nāsti pitā, nāsti sukṛtaduṣkṛtānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalavipāka iti |
XXjsphustu:1067: amukasmai bhikṣave dātavyoyaṃ madīyo lābha ityevaṃ lābhe samutpanne sati yadi kaścidyatiḥ mriyate tadā niyatamavaśyaṃ tasmai vikalpitabhikṣave sa lābho deya iti bhagavatoktaṃ |
XXjsphustu:1069: ito deśāttraimāsamadhiṣṭhāyānyatra deśāntaragatasya yateḥ lābhaḥ kalpe mandire kalpakuṭayāṃ sthāpayitabyaḥ |
XXjsphustu:1070: yadā cāvarṣoṣitavibhrāntakudṛṣṭayastrayaḥ pudgalāḥ saṃghasyānartha kurvanti, tadā tebhyaḥ prāśyādi na sāṃghikamannapānādi dātavyaṃ budhaiḥ |
XXjsphustu:1071: nanuca lābhaṃ nārhanti pañcaketyuktaṃ (SŚ 41) tatkimarthamidamucyate- amuṣmai deyamityādi kārikādvayaṃ? satyametat |
XXjsphustu:1072: kintu yadā avikalpo mriyate, anutpanne ca lābhe
XXjsphustu:1073: gacchati, avarṣoṣitavibhrāntakudṛṣṭayaśca trayaḥ pudgalāḥ yadānarthaṃ vā kurvanti, tadaite pañca pudgalā lābhaṃ nārhanti, viparyayādarhantīti vyabhicārasaṃbhavādadoṣaḥ ||
XXjsphustu:1076: tatra yadi dānapati sāmānyenaivaṃ vadet- ācchādaṃ dāsyāmi, cīvaraṃ dāsyāmi,
XXjsphustu:1077: cīvaramūlyaṃ dāsyāmi, ācchādamūlyaṃ dāsyāmītyebhiścaturbhiḥ śabdairutpadyate yo lābhaḥ sa samukhībhūtānāṃ prāpnoti, netareṣāṃ |
XXjsphustu:1080: cīvarakrayaṃ caitaiścaturbhiśca śabdairyo lābhaḥ samupajāyate, sa varṣoṣitānāṃ prāpnoti |
XXjsphustu:1082: dadāti, tadā dāyakasyecchayā gṛhṇato na doṣaḥ ||
XXjsphustu:1084: yasmin divase bhagavānutpannaḥ anuttarāñca samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ tatra yo maho yā pūjā, sa jātisaṃbodhyādimahaḥ |
XXjsphustu:1085: tata utpanno yo lābhaḥ saṃghasya sa evamucyate |
XXjsphustu:1087: kālikaḥ yāmikaḥ yāvajjīvikaḥ sāptāhikaḥ mṛtapariṣkāraḥ kṣudrapariṣkāraḥ naityakaḥ akālacīvaraṃ kuṭīpratiṣṭhā jātisaṃbodhyādimahodbhavaśceti yo 'yaṃ
XXjsphustu:1090: sāṃghikaṃ yacchayanāsanaṃ tadanādheyaṃ, pratibandhatvena na dātavyamityarthaḥ |
XXjsphustu:1091: na vikretavyaṃ, na ca paudvalikaṃ kṛtvā paribhoktavyaṃ |
XXjsphustu:1092: ye tu śrāmaṇerāḥ (SŚ 42) sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanaṃ pratibandhakatvena dadati, vikrīṇīte, paudgalikatvena vā paribhuñjateraṃ
XXjsphustu:1097: saṃmukhībhūtāya vā saṃghāya tatsarvaṃ yatistatra tatropanāmayet |
XXjsphustu:1100: kaściddānapatiḥ vihāramāgatya muktāphalādika datvā tūṣṇīṃ bhūto gacchet |
XXjsphustu:1101: tasmin tūṣṇīṃ datvā gate dānapatau sati buddhāya bhagavate muktā phalādi dātavyaṃ, yacchayanāsanaṃ taccāturdiśāya |
XXjsphustu:1103: katibhiraṅgaiḥ samanvāgato 'dattādānaṃ gṛhṇan aśrāmaṇero bhavati? āha |
XXjsphustu:1109: kadāciddravyaṃ paropāttamapi sat yatiḥ paropāttasaṃjñā na bhavatītyata āha |
XXjsphustu:1111: kadācidetatsarvaṃ bhava[ti], na tu steyacetanetyataḥ steyacetaneti vacanaṃ |
XXjsphustu:1113: kadācidetadaṅgacatuṣṭayaṃ saṃbhavadapi sat taddravya sthānānna cyāvitaṃ syādityata āha |
XXjsphustu:1115: pañcabhiraṅgaiḥ samanvāgato yatiradattamādadāno 'pi na cyutasaṃvaro bhavati |
XXjsphustu:1118: dattasaṃjñā svakasaṃjñā aparopāttasaṃjñā ca vidyate yasya yateḥ sa yathokto yatiḥ |
XXjsphustu:1119: anyo 'pi ca svāṃśāttāvatkālikatvena ca gṛhṇan na saṃvaraṃ saṃvarī jahāti |
XXjsphustu:1122: adattaṃ pu[naḥ] dravyaṃ utpluyedvadhvā khamākāśaṃ gatvā |
XXjsphustu:1130: kaścidyatiḥ kenacitkrīto bhavati, bhṛtako vā sa
XXjsphustu:1131: ajñānāt smṛtisaṃpramoṣātkalpikasaṃjñayā vā paradravyaṃ gṛhṇan kṣatasaṃvaro bhavati |
XXjsphustu:1132: unmattavikṣiptacetasastu yatayaḥ parasvamādadānā api santonāpattibhājo bhavanti stainyacittābhāvāt
XXjsphustu:1134: upakāryapakārimya ityārabhya yāvat tūṣṇīṃ datvetyādibhirvākyaiḥ duṣkṛtānyudāhṛtāni |
XXjsphustu:1141: nā ca strī ca paṇḍakaśceti nṛstrīpaṇḍakāsteṣāṃ yāni viṇmūtravaktrāṇi,
XXjsphustu:1142: teṣāṃ yat randhraṃ vivaraṃ chidraṃ, tasmin aṅgajātaṃ puruṣendriyaṃ
XXjsphustu:1143: tilamātramapi prakṣipya yaḥ śrāmaṇeraḥ svādaṃ nigamayet sa kṣatasaṃvarā bhavati, ayatibhavatītyarthaḥ
XXjsphustu:1144: manuṣyagativyatirikteṣvapi strīpuruṣapaṇḍakeṣu maithunamadhyācarataḥ saṃvaratyāgo bhavatīti darśayannāha |
XXjsphustu:1153: manuṣyagatiparyāpannāḥ, amanuṣyagatiparyāpannāstiryaggatiparyāpannāśca nṛstrīpaṇḍakā jāgranto mṛtāḥ suptāśca maithunāśrayā avagantavyā iti |
XXjsphustu:1154: apare punarmānuṣā[mānuṣā]ste tu tiryañcaścāmarādaya iti pāṭhaṃ matvaivaṃ bruva[te] |
XXjsphustu:1158: ta eva nṛstrīpaṇḍakā manuṣyagatiparigṛhītāḥ amanuṣyagatiparigṛhītāḥ tiryaggatiparigṛhītāśca pratyekaṃ jāgranto mṛtāḥ suptāśca maithunāśrayā jñeyāḥ |
XXjsphustu:1159: amarādaya ityamarā devāḥ ādiśabdenānyāmapi gati grāhayati |
XXjsphustu:1160: ato devāsuranarakapretagatisaṃgṛhīteṣvapi strīpuruṣapaṇḍakeṣu maithunamadhyācarataḥ saṃvaratyāgo bhavati |
XXjsphustu:1162: anyathā hi narādaya ityanena nṛstrītareṣāṃ grahaṇe siddhe tviti tacchabdagrahaṇamatiricyate
XXjsphustu:1165: na hi pratyakṣāpātteṣu śabdeṣu tacchabdaḥ prayujyata sūribhiranavasthāprasaṅgāt |
XXjsphustu:1166: na cāpi tacchabdena viṇmūtravaktrarandhrasya saṃbandha iti pāryate vaktuṃ,
XXjsphustu:1167: randhraśabdasya napuṃsakaliṅgatvāt ekavacananirdeśāt, iha ca te tviti puṃliṅgena bahuvacanena nirdeśāt |
XXjsphustu:1168: atha mataṃ- viṇmatravaktrarandhraviśeṣā iti vyākhyāsyāma iti |
XXjsphustu:1169: yathā hi viṇmūtravaktrarandhraviśeṣāḥ strīpuruṣapaṇḍakāḥ manuṣyāmanuṣyatiryagga[ti]parigṛhītā maithunāśrayā jñeyā ityapūrvāyaṃ kriyākāra[ka]saṃbandhaḥ narādīnāmiti saṃbandhaṣaṣṭhayabhāvāt anyasyāśca gateḥ parigrahaṇāt |
XXjsphustu:1171: evaṃ vicārite kecidatra bruvata narādaya ityapi pāṭhe ādiśabdena strīpaṇḍakayoranya[syā]śca gateḥ parigraho bhaviṣyati |
XXjsphustu:1174: atra na sarvā tiryagyonirabhipretā sūkṣmaudārikatvena maithunākṣamatvāt |
XXjsphustu:1178: atrāntarāle yānyonyāpekṣayākṣudrikā maṃhato jātiḥ tāṃ tāṃ gacchan tasyāṃ tasyā jātau maithunamācaran vratāccyavate, aśrāmaṇerā bhavatītyarthaḥ |
XXjsphustu:1179: ata evādinirdeśāt hastinījāteyānyā mahattarā jātiḥ, kukkuṭājāteśca yānyā (SŚ
XXjsphustu:1180: 46) svalpatarā tasyāṃ vipratipadyamānasya na saṃvaratyāgaḥ, kintu duṣkṛtaṃ syāditi ||
XXjsphustu:1181: yatirna kevalaṃ maithunamadhyācaritaṃ na kṣamate strīdarśanādyapi na kṣamata iti pratipāda[ya]nnāha
XXjsphustu:1183: yatiḥ saṃraktaḥ san striyaṃ na paśyet, na ca tasyāḥ śabdamākarṇayet |
XXjsphustu:1184: nirvastraśca san nirvastrāṃ striyaṃ nopeyāt, na gacchet, na ca puruṣendriyaṃ nirbhujet |
XXjsphustu:1186: kiṃ punaḥ pāṭitāyāmapi maithunamadhyācarataḥ saṃvaratyāgo bhavati?
XXjsphustu:1188: strīndriyādhiṣṭhānasaṃjñitāṃ koṭarikāṃ vātātapādinā śuṣkāṃ śastreṇavā pṛthak pṛthak kṛtāṃ tattailādibhiḥ klinnāṃ saṃyojyaikīkṛtya yaḥ śrāmaṇero vipratipadyate sa nāśayitavyaḥ |
XXjsphustu:1190: yadi sā koṭarikā sagrahamupayāti, tadā doṣo 'nyadā neti ||
XXjsphustu:1193: tasyā adhaḥ khaṇḍe upari khaṇḍe ca vinīlādhmātikāñcavratī na vrajet |
XXjsphustu:1194: yā cāsthisaṅkalā pūyarudhirādibhiramyaktā tāmapi na yāyāt |
XXjsphustu:1196: sitā śuklā yā asthisaṅkalā, śailamayī yā śilāyāṃ nidhātā dārumayī yā
XXjsphustu:1198: tāṃ sitāsthisaṅkalāṃ yāvatpustamayīṃ striyaṃ na gacchet |
XXjsphustu:1201: tasmātsadā sarvakālaṃ yo virata iti yativiśeṣaṇaṃ ||
XXjsphustu:1204: dhyānamiddhagatastaṃ dhyānasamāpannaṃ nidrayābhibhūtaṃ ca vibuddhamapi śayitaṃ surāpānādinā mattaṃ mahābhūtavaiṣamyādinā vā vikṣiptacittaṃ rukṣayā vā vedanayā tunnaṃ vyathitaṃ yati yā kācitstrī balādgṛhītvā yateraṅgajātaṃ ātmīye 'ṅgajāte
XXjsphustu:1208: ādāvaṃgajātapraveśakāle, madhye paryavasāne ca ya āsvāda nigamayet |
XXjsphustu:1215: nānā prakārāṇāṃ vyañjanānāṃ rasānāṃ nānāvidhena yadupetaṃ samanvitaṃ śāliḥbhaktaṃ tasya paribhogaḥ tadvadāsvādanā draṣṭavyā |
XXjsphustu:1216: yathā śauṇḍasya mattavālakasya tailava[t] svacchasyānnāsavasya surāyāḥ pānāsvādastadvat maithunāsvādo 'vaseyaḥ |
XXjsphustu:1217: anye anyathā vyācakṣate śuṇḍiṣu bhavaḥ śauṇḍaḥ |
XXjsphustu:1220: tailava[t] svaccho yaḥ śoṇḍo 'nnāsavaḥ, tasya pānamabhyavaharaṇaṃ |
XXjsphustu:1226: yathā ca sukumārasya puṃsaḥ (SŚ 48) pradīptalohasparśastadvadanāsvādo vijñeyaḥ |
XXjsphustu:1236: rañjanaṃ rāgaḥ, rañjayate vāneneti cittamiti rāgaḥ |
XXjsphustu:1237: tena rāgādinā praguṇībhūtaṃ yadaṃgajātaṃ tacchukranirmokṣārthaṃ na kadācidapi spṛśet |

XXjsphustu:1274: yā strī māṃ paricarenmama paricaryāṃ kuryāt |

XXjsphustu:1307: cet, na pratiṣedho 'yaṃ vartate- na kuryāditi |

XXjsphustu:1337: yaduktaṃ jñānadarśanaṃ mamāstīti bruvan mithyā nāśya iti tatra katarajjñānaṃ katamacca darśanamiti na jñāyate |

XXjsphustu:1357: smarati- amutrāhaṃ evannāmā evaṃgotrāka ityādi, āstravakṣayajñānaṃ yenātmano jānāti- kṣīṇā me jātiruṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ yāvannāparamitthatvamiti |

XXjsphustu:1369: dharmajñānādīnāmaṅgīkaraṇe anyaṃ pūrvokto na yogya iti saṃvaratyāgo bhavatīti ||

XXjsphustu:1388: tatra dṛṣṭaṃ yaccakṣurvijñānenānubhūtaṃ śrutaṃ yacchotravijñātaṃ, mataṃ yadghrāṇajihvākāya vijñānaiḥ vijñātaṃ yanmanovijñānenetyeke |
XXjsphustu:1390: punarāhuḥ- dṛṣṭaṃ yat pañcabhirindriyaiḥ paricchinnaṃ, śrutaṃ yatparata āgamitaṃ, mataṃ yatsvayamupapattito 'vadhāritaṃ, vijñātaṃ yanmanasā pratyātmavedyenākāreṇa paricchannaṃ tasmin dṛṣṭe dṛṣṭamiti vadet yāvadvijñātaṃmiti |
XXjsphustu:1398: vastu ca bhavati, alīkasaṃjñī ca bhavati, vinihitaṃ cittaṃ bhavati, mṛṣāvādasaṃjño
XXjsphustu:1400: etāni pañcāṅgāni yasya santi sa pañcāṅgaḥ |
XXjsphustu:1405: tatra vastu ca bhavatīti- yathā paricchinnaṃ tathā tadastītyarthato na tu dravyatostīti, anyathā hyasaṃvidyamānaṃ vastva'stoti jñātvā nāstīti bruvato 'nāpattiḥ syāt |
XXjsphustu:1406: alīkasaṃjñī ca bhavatīti- yathā paricchinnādanyathā kathayāmītyeva saṃjñā ityarthaḥ |
XXjsphustu:1407: cittaṃ vinihitaṃ bhavatīti yathā paricchinnajñeyaviparītadyotinīvāksamutthāpakaṃ (SŚ 56) cittaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ |
XXjsphustu:1408: evamapi mṛṣāvādasaṃjñī ca bhavatīti atraivāntargatatvāt kasmāta pṛthagucyate |
XXjsphustu:1411: tasminstu satīda yathārtha paricchinnajñeyaviparītārthadyātinyā vācaḥ samutthāpakaṃ cittaṃ pṛthageva kāraṇatvenocyata iti naitasminnantarbhāvaḥ |

XXjsphustu:1414: tathā ca mṛṣāvāda iṣyate yathā śnigdhaste mukhavarṇa ityādinā |
XXjsphustu:1416: yo vitathasaṃjñī sa nāvaśyaṃ mṛṣāvādasaṃjñī, yastu mṛṣāvādasaṃjñī so 'vaśyaṃ
XXjsphustu:1417: vitathasaṃjñīti yena dvābhyāmevāṅgābhyāṃ mṛṣāvāda iṣyata iti |

XXjsphustu:1499: ebhirapi kācitsurā saṃcīyata ityetāḥ surā jñātavyāḥ ||

XXjsphustu:1513: ata eva madanīyaṃ pūgaphalādi jñātvā na bhakṣaṇīyaṃ ||
XXjsphustu:1515: kodravānnaṃ ca bhuñjīta na ca syāt duṣkṛtaṃ kathaṃ ||

XXjsphustu:1522: tasyāṣṭau yānyaṅgulāni tatpramāṇaṃ pādakamasyeti jināṣṭāṅgulapādakaṃ śayanāsanaṃ |
XXjsphustu:1526: yacchayanāsanaṃ pramāṇapuruṣahastapramāṇapādakaṃ tasmin mañce pīṭhe vā yatiḥ śrāmaṇeraḥ āsīta [u]paviśedityarthaḥ |
XXjsphustu:1529: kiṃ tarhi vinā śalye[na], śalyaṃ hitvetyarthaḥ |
XXjsphustu:1530: ataḥ pramāṇādhike mañce pīṭhe vā ya upaviśati, tasya duṣkṛtaṃ bhavati |
XXjsphustu:1532: suvarṇarūpyamaye tu mañce pīṭhe vā jināṣṭāṅgulapramāṇepyupaviṣṭuṃ [na] labhyata iti |
XXjsphustu:1534: kimarthamidamabhidhīyate- hemarūpyakṛte neti? yāvatā kāyena pāṇipādādyairvastracchatrādinetyādi vakṣyate |
XXjsphustu:1538: kintu kasyacidiyamāśaṅkā syāt sāṃghike rukmarūpyamaye śayanāsane upaviśato na kaściddoṣaḥ paudgalikasyaiva sparśapratiṣedhāditi |
XXjsphustu:1543: tatrāpi jināṣṭāṅgulapramāṇe 'pi mañce pīṭhe vā vinā pratyāstaraṇenopaviṣṭuṃ [na] labhyata iti darśayitumāha |
XXjsphustu:1547: tacca pratyāstaraṇa na tṛṇapatrādika mabhipretaṃ, kintu viṣṭaretyāha |
XXjsphustu:1549: sūkṣmasya vastrasya tripuṭaṃ ghanasya vastrasya dvipuṭaṃ kambalasya ekapuṭaṃ pratyāstaraṇamiṣṭaṃ,
XXjsphustu:1552: atirekaprāmāṇike sāṃghike śayanāsane yathā pratipattavyaṃ tathā darśanannāha |
XXjsphustu:1562: kiṃ evaṃ vratī niṣeveta sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanaṃ? śayanāsanamiti vakṣyate |
XXjsphustu:1564: athavā caturṣu kīlakeṣu tānatirekapramāṇakān pādān ṭaṃkitvā badhvā kiṃ kartavyamiti na jñāyate
XXjsphustu:1568: ikṣuyavagodhūmādīnāṃ (SŚ 63) rakṣārthaṃ yaddīrghapādaḥ mañcaḥ kriyate, tatrādhvago yatiḥ svapet
XXjsphustu:1570: tatrāpi gṛhiṇāṃ śayanāsane yatinā na pādau lambīyayitavyau- mā bhūjjanāvadhyānamiti ||
XXjsphustu:1571: pravrajyāṃ prasāṇīkṛtya yathāvṛddhikayā sāṃghikaṃ vihāramuddeṣṭavyamiti darśayannāha |
XXjsphustu:1573: yadi bahavaḥ śrāmaṇerā bhavanti vihārāśca stokāstadā ekaikaṃ vi[hā]raṃ dvādaśebhyaḥ śrāmaṇerebhyo
XXjsphustu:1574: | athaivamapi bahavoyatayo bhavanti, tadā antato 'gatyā nirmuṣṭakaṃ hastamekaikasmai śrāmaṇerāya dātavyaṃ |
XXjsphustu:1577: viparyayāt? yadi bahavo vihārā bhavanti yatayaśca [stokāḥ], tadā ekaismai api śrāmaṇerāya bahavo vihārā dātavyāḥ |
XXjsphustu:1580: yadi stokaṃ śayanāsanaṃ bhavati yatayaśca bahavaḥ, tadā tatra yo vṛddhaḥ sa mañce svapet |
XXjsphustu:1582: athaivamapi sarveṣāṃ na bhavati, tadā yāvadvṛkṣamūle vṛddhena svaptavyaṃ,
XXjsphustu:1583: navakena tvabhyavakāśaka ityevaṃ yathāvṛddhikayā sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanamuddeṣṭavyaṃ |
XXjsphustu:1593: evamarthaṃ sāṃghika śayanāsanamuddiśyate na vyasanitayeti darśayati ||
XXjsphustu:1596: yadi bhūyāṃsi layanāni santi saṃvariṇaścālpīyānsastadā āgantukānāṃ bhikṣūṇāmavasthitaye layanatrayaṃ sthāpayitavyaṃ kīdṛśamityāha |
XXjsphustu:1600: teṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ layanānāṃ madhye yaduttamaṃ layanaṃ tadvṛddhāyāgantukabhikṣave uddeṣṭavyaṃ yanmadhyaṃ tattato navakāya, yaddhīnaṃ tatsarvanavakāyeti ||
XXjsphustu:1603: yasmādatīvoccaṃ śayanāsanaṃ yateḥ śrāmaṇerasya madakaraṃ, auddhatyakaraṃ, lākāvadhyānasya ca hetukāraṇaṃ,
XXjsphustu:1613: yasmin krīḍāsthāne utsavādike gatvā vigataśokāḥ syuḥ strīpuruṣāstatkrīḍāsthānaṃ vigataśokaṃ yatirna yāyāt |
XXjsphustu:1614: yastu śrāmaṇero hṛṣṭaḥ san nṛ[tya]ti gāyati vāditraṃ vādagrati,
XXjsphustu:1622: vyādhiḥ saṃjāto yasyeti vyādhito, glāna ityarthaḥ |
XXjsphustu:1628: pūrvaṃ munaye buddhāya bhagavate candanādikaṃ gandhaṃ datvā paścādātmanā dhārayet |
XXjsphustu:1629: svasthastu yatiḥ kadācidapi candanādikaṃ gandhaṃ na dhārayet ||
XXjsphustu:1631: sati prakaṭe deśe candanādyanuliptagātro yatiḥ glāno
